publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1880# Mark Ballard: Vote for Trade Justice—That the Parliament notes the mass lobby of the Scottish Parliament in support of the Vote for Trade Justice campaign between 12 and 2 pm on 27 October 2004; further notes that each Member of the Scottish Parliament has been challenged to cast their vote for trade justice in a giant trade justice ballot box; also notes that Elaine C Smith will chair an open-air rally in support of trade justice, and believes that members should support the reform of unjust and unfair trade rules, for which the trade justice campaign calls, through this and other actions.
S2M-1880# Vote for Trade Justice (lodged on 25 October 2004) Bill Butler*
S2M-1880# Vote for Trade Justice (lodged on 25 October 2004) Scott Barrie*, Donald Gorrie*

S2M-1880# Mark Ballard: Vote for Trade Justice—That the Parliament notes the mass lobby of the Scottish Parliament in support of the Vote for Trade Justice campaign between 12 and 2 pm on 27 October 2004; further notes that each Member of the Scottish Parliament has been challenged to cast their vote for trade justice in a giant trade justice ballot box; also notes that Elaine C Smith will chair an open-air rally in support of trade justice, and believes that members should support the reform of unjust and unfair trade rules, for which the trade justice campaign calls, through this and other actions. Supported by: Bill Butler, Scott Barrie, Donald Gorrie, Marlyn Glen*
S2M-1880# Vote for Trade Justice (lodged on 25 October 2004) Pauline McNeill*
